text: we are a divided country which is why
it's important for the Prime Minister
and for others to try and bring the
country together and work out a way
through this and I don't think we should
take any rash decisions at the moment in
the next days and weeks we've got to see
what the fallout is we've got to handle
that in a mature and sensible way I
think the Prime Minister is absolutely
right not to invoke the article 50
process at this point in time we've got
a we've got to reflect we've got to
unite and then we've got a charter way
forward this in the interest of the
country because when you're dealing with
massive questions I mean these are
questions of fundamental importance to
our future economically in our security
in our politics
